articles.title: Kim Jong Un Sends Congratulatory Message to Xi Jinping
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un Sends Congratulatory Message to Xi Jinping
 Pyongyang, October 26 (KCNA) -- Kim Jong Un, chairman of the Workers' Party of Korea, sent a congratulatory message to Xi Jinping, general secretary of the Central Committee of the Communist Party of China, on Wednesday.
					 The message extended sincere congratulations to Xi Jinping upon the successful 19th Congress of the Communist Party of China and his election as general secretary of the CPC Central Committee and chairman of the CPC Central Military Commission.
					
					 The Chinese people have entered the road of building socialism with the Chinese characteristics in the new era under the guidance of the CPC Central Committee with Xi Jinping at the core, the message said.
					
					 It wished him great success in his responsible work for carrying out the tasks set forth at the 19th Congress of the CPC.
					
					 It expressed the conviction that the relations between the two parties and the two countries would develop in the interests of the peoples of the two countries.

articles.title: Spokesperson of NSGC of DPRK Slams U.S. Despicable Sanctions
articles.content:
Spokesperson of NSGC of DPRK Slams U.S. Despicable Sanctions
 Pyongyang, October 26 (KCNA) -- A spokesperson of the National Sports Guidance Committee of the Democratic People's Republic of Korea Thursday issued a press statement. It said:
					 Today, the frantic campaign of sanctions and pressure led by the U.S. against the DPRK is stretching its tentacles deep into the area of sports as well.
					
					 The U.S. has included various kinds of sports equipment and apparatus in the sanctions list and sees to it that not only the sales of sports equipment and apparatus to the DPRK are prohibited, but also the transit through the territory of other countries of the items donated to the DPRK by international sports organizations is blocked.
					
					 Due to the despicable and relentless pressure of the U.S., the regular leg matches which were set to be played in Pyongyang according to the agreements with some countries are being delayed for more than a year, and the decisions by relevant international sports organizations to hold 2017 World Junior Judo Championship and 2018 International Weightlifting Federation Junior World Championship in the DPRK were overturned. Australia even denied the entry of the DPRK players to take part in the AFC U-19 Championship 2018 Qualifiers.
					
					 Sports activities that promote friendship among peoples of the world and development of human civilization should not be abused in any case for sinister political purposes.
					
					 However, the heinous sanctions targeting the sports area of the DPRK, which the U.S. pursues by instigating its vassal forces, are an act that destroys modern civilization while seeking to overthrow the DPRK's ideology and system and completely shut out our people from enjoying proper cultural life.
					
					 This is clearly substantiated by the reckless remarks that Trump made recently at the UN General Assembly about "totally destroying" the DPRK. 
					
					 The U.S. abuses even the lofty goals of sports for its wicked political purpose to topple the system of a sovereign state, but international sports organizations should defend the ideal of sports to promote peace and progress for humanity and development of humankind's physical culture and modern civilization.

articles.title: DPRK Youth and Students Delegation Returns
articles.content:
DPRK Youth and Students Delegation Returns
 Pyongyang, October 26 (KCNA) -- The DPRK delegation of youth and students headed by Jon Yong Nam, first secretary of the Central Committee of the Kimilsungist-Kimjongilist Youth League, returned home on Thursday after participating in the 19th World Festival of Youth and Students held in Sochi, Russia.

articles.title: Greetings to Kim Jong Un from Russian Party Leader
articles.content:
Greetings to Kim Jong Un from Russian Party Leader
 Pyongyang, October 26 (KCNA) -- Kim Jong Un, chairman of the Workers' Party of Korea, received a message of greeting from V. V. Zhirinovsky, chairman of the Liberal Democratic Party of Russia, on Oct. 10.
					 The message extended congratulations to Kim Jong Un on the 72nd founding anniversary of the WPK, a historic event in the Korean people's life.
					
					 The WPK founded by the great leader Comrade Kim Il Sung is a reliable fortress of the Korean people and a model of power and will for the international community, it said.
					
					 The message wished Kim Jong Un and the people of the DPRK peaceful life on the Korean peninsula and every family of the DPRK happiness and prosperity.

articles.title: 6th National Conference of Judicial Officers Held
articles.content:
6th National Conference of Judicial Officers Held
 Pyongyang, October 26 (KCNA) -- The Sixth National Conference of Judicial Officers took place at the People's Palace of Culture on Wednesday.
					 The conference analyzed and reviewed the achievements, experience and lessons made in the work to establish the revolutionary atmosphere of law observance for five years since the Fifth Conference and discussed the tasks and ways for further strengthening the socialist law-abiding life as required by the developing revolution.
					
					 Present at the conference were Kim Yong Nam, member of the Presidium of the Political Bureau of the Central Committee of the Workers' Party of Korea and president of the Presidium of the Supreme People's Assembly of the DPRK; Vice-President of the SPA Presidium Yang Hyong Sop, Vice-Chairman of the C.C., WPK Pak Thae Song and Minister of the People's Security Choe Pu Il; and officials concerned, members of the socialist law-abiding life guidance committees at all levels, judicial officers and exemplary explainers of law-abiding.
					
					 Respected Supreme Leader Kim Jong Un's letter to the Sixth Conference was read out.
					
					 Yang Hyong Sop made a report which was followed by speeches.
					
					 The reporter and speakers said Kim Jong Un's letter is an undying library that enriched the idea and theory of President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il on the law-abiding life and the militant banner to be held fast to in the work to establish the atmosphere of revolutionary law observance in the whole society.
					
					 They stated that the proud history of the socialist law-abiding life in the DPRK is a history of immortal exploits of the peerlessly great men.
					
					 The exploits Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il performed in the socialist law-abiding life have been successfully carried forward thanks to the respected Supreme Leader, they said.
					
					 They referred to the successes achieved in the work to improve and strengthen the socialist law-abiding life in the past.
					
					 They called for bringing about a new revolutionary turn in the socialist law-abiding life under the guidance of the Party to guarantee by law the all-out offensive for carrying out the decisions of the Seventh Congress of the WPK.

articles.title: Sojourn of Participants of Sixth National Conference of Judicial Officers Here
articles.content:
Sojourn of Participants of Sixth National Conference of Judicial Officers Here
 Pyongyang, October 26 (KCNA) -- The participants in the Sixth National Conference of Judicial Officers toured different parts of Pyongyang.
					 They visited the Korean Revolution Museum.
					
					 Looking at the photos of President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il displayed in various rooms of the museum, the visitors recalled the exploits performed by the great leaders who set forth the Juche-based law-building idea and theory and provided a legal guarantee for socialist construction and the people's happiness. And they went round historic relics and data on display.
					
					 At the Revolutionary Martyrs Cemetery on Mt Taesong, they laid bouquets at the bust of anti-Japanese war heroine Kim Jong Suk.
					
					 The participants also toured the Victorious Fatherland Liberation War Museum which was built into a centre for education in the victorious tradition and anti-U.S. class education.

articles.title: Palestinian Ambassador Gives Reception
articles.content:
Palestinian Ambassador Gives Reception
 Pyongyang, October 26 (KCNA) -- Ismail Ahmed Mohamed Hasan, Palestinian ambassador to the DPRK, gave a reception at the embassy on Thursday to mark the 72nd anniversary of the Workers' Party of Korea.
					 Present on invitation were Ri Su Yong, member of the Political Bureau and vice-chairman of the C.C., WPK, Pak Chun Nam, minister of Culture, Ju Yong Gil, chairman of the C.C., General Federation of Trade Unions of Korea who is chairman of the DPRK-Palestine Friendship and Solidarity Committee, and officials concerned.
					
					 A staff member of the Palestinian embassy was on hand.
					
					 The ambassador said at the reception that the founding of the WPK by President Kim Il Sung was a historic event as it brought a fundamental turn in carving out the destiny of the Korean people.
					
					 Under the tested and experienced guidance of Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il, eternal leaders of the Korean people, the WPK ushered in the era of glory and prosperity for building a socialist state, and it will steadily advance under the leadership of Marshal Kim Jong Un, he stressed.
					
					 Expressing thanks and respects to the firm stand of the DPRK always supporting the Palestinian people's cause of justice for building an independent state, the ambassador wished the great WPK and the Korean people well-being, progress and prosperity.
					
					 Ri Su Yong said it is an expression of reverence for Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il that the Palestinian friends have significantly celebrated the anniversary of the WPK together with the Korean people every year.
					
					 He expressed the stand of the WPK and the DPRK government to boost the militant friendship and solidarity between the peoples of the two countries.
					
					 The Korean people will as ever extend invariable support and solidarity the Palestinian people in the just cause to put an end to the Israeli aggressors' occupation and retake the legitimate national rights including the founding of an independent state, he stressed.

articles.title: Rabbit Show and Seminar on Experience Held
articles.content:
Rabbit Show and Seminar on Experience Held
 Anbyon, October 26 (KCNA) -- A rabbit show and seminar on experience of youth league and children's union organizations at schools and schoolchildren across the country took place at Paehwa Senior Middle School in Anbyon County, Kangwon Province on Thursday.
					 Present there were officials of the youth league, principals and students of schools which set a good example in breeding rabbits.
					
					 On display there were new breeds of rabbits raised by schoolchildren through their active extramural activities and rabbits of diverse breeds suited to the climatic and soil conditions of Korea.
					
					 The participants showed their interest in successes and experience gained in the work to breed rabbits, take veterinary and anti-epizootic measure and lay material foundation for rabbit sheds at schools.

articles.title: National Records Renewed in DPRK Championships
articles.content:
National Records Renewed in DPRK Championships
 Pyongyang, October 26 (KCNA) -- National records were renewed in shooting and archery events of the recent DPRK Championships.
					 Holders of the new records were produced in men's individual 10-meter pistol, women's individual 10-meter rifle, men's individual 25-meter rapid fire pistol, men's individual 50-meter 3-position rifle shooting, women's team 10-meter running target and women's team 10-meter running target mixed events.
					
					 And a player from the Defense Sports Team of the Korean People's Army broke the national record of the 13th People's Games in women's individual 72 arrows shooting event.

articles.title: National Integrated Power Control System Renewed in DPRK
articles.content:
National Integrated Power Control System Renewed in DPRK
 Pyongyang, October 26 (KCNA) -- The national integrated power control system has been renewed in the DPRK as part of the drive for implementing the tasks set forth at the Second Plenary Meeting of the Seventh Central Committee of the Workers' Party of Korea.
					 The electric power industrial sector has established the power control system based on load control device and power-line communication in South Phyongan Province and other provinces and cities. And, on the basis of mobile network, it has introduced power control system into Pyongyang City and realized the power control by relying on data concentrator and digital multi-functional watt-hour meter.
					
					 It has also reinforced power control technical devices at hydro-power stations and substations in different parts of the country and formed data communication network.
					
					 Han Chol San, an official of the Ministry of Electric Power Industry, said that the renewed national integrated power control system reduces the loss of electricity in transmission, thoroughly ensures the balance between production and consumption of electricity and stabilizes frequency.

articles.title: Agent for Preserving Art Works Developed in DPRK
articles.content:
Agent for Preserving Art Works Developed in DPRK
 Pyongyang, October 26 (KCNA) -- The State Science and Technology Commission of the DPRK has recently registered an agent for preserving art works as latest technical product.
					 This agent was developed by a research group in the field of national heritage conservation and a nano technology was applied in it.
					
					 The agent does not damage ground material of art works and their depiction and is helpful to restoring the faded color to their original state.
					
					 The research group overcame the deficiency of Korean paintings, oil paintings, photos, visual aids, stone slogan-board and all other pictures and prints, settled new sci-tech issues and thus made it possible to preserve artistic and ornamental value of works.
					
					 According to an official concerned, as it covers ultraviolet, it prevents art works from decolorizing and has great resistance to heat and moisture and completely prevents microorganism from growing, thus lengthening the preservation 3-10 times in the open air and 50-100 years in the interior.
					
					 In recent years, this agent has been applied to the Korean Central History Museum, the Cultural Heritage Management Office of Mausoleum of King Tongmyong, the Korean Art Gallery and other units across the country.

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun Calls for Staging Nationwide Anti-U.S., Anti-War Struggle for Protecting Peace
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun Calls for Staging Nationwide Anti-U.S., Anti-War Struggle for Protecting Peace
 Pyongyang, October 26 (KCNA) -- The anti-U.S., anti-war struggle is a just one to put an end to the U.S. imperialists' criminal moves for igniting a war of aggression, protect the vital rights of the nation and pave an avenue to peace and reunification, says Rodong Sinmun Thursday in an article.
					 The article goes on:
					
					 The U.S. and south Korean puppet war maniacs' frantic moves for provoking a war against the DPRK is bring irreversible terrible disaster to the Korean nation.
					
					 The situation requires all Koreans in the north, the south and abroad to further their nation-wide struggle to foil the U.S. and its lackeys' moves for provoking a war against the DPRK under the uplifted banner of the anti-U.S., anti-war struggle for protecting peace.
					
					 Peace should be achieved through resolute struggle against the war moves of the bellicose forces at home and abroad.
					
					 One is responsible for his or her own destiny and all Koreans in the north, the south and abroad are responsible for the struggle for peace.
					
					 All Koreans at home and abroad should stage more brisk nation-wide struggle against the U.S. reckless moves for provoking a war against the DPRK and against the treachery acts of the south Korean authorities blindly following the U.S., bearing in mind that only the anti-U.S., anti-war struggle for protecting peace provides the life and future of the Korean nation.
					
					 The south Korean people, irrespective of their ideology, political view and ism, should turn out in the anti-U.S., anti-war struggle for protecting peace in order to protect their own lives and security.
					
					 The danger of war can never be defused as long as the U.S. imperialist forces are present in south Korea.

articles.title: S. Korean Workers Launch Action against Evils
articles.content:
S. Korean Workers Launch Action against Evils
 Pyongyang, October 26 (KCNA) -- The south Korean Confederation of Trade Unions launched an intensive action for combating the evils the puppet conservative regime left in the field of labor, according to the south Korean online paper Jaju Sibo.
					 The organization held a press conference outside the "National Assembly" building on Monday in this regard and announced a declaration of the action.
					
					 Noting that the struggle for judging Park Geun Hye in last winter fully showed the strength of candlelight demonstrators including workers and made a history of victory, the declaration stressed that the Confederation would never stop the struggle against the evils.

articles.title: Juvenile Drug Addicts Increase in S. Korea
articles.content:
Juvenile Drug Addicts Increase in S. Korea
 Pyongyang, October 26 (KCNA) -- The number of juvenile drug addicts is steadily increasing in south Korea, according to the south Korean Financial News on Oct. 21.
					 Curtailed data of the south Korean puppet authorities showed that last year witnessed an increase of the number of juvenile drug addicts more than three times over that in 2012.
					
					 There is uproar that juvenile addicts will be an all-time high this year.

articles.title: S. Korean Chief Executive Slammed
articles.content:
S. Korean Chief Executive Slammed
Pyongyang, October 26 (KCNA) -- A south Korean newspaper on Oct. 19 carried an editorial blasting the south Korean chief executive and politicians for turning away their faces from the event marking the lapse of 38 years since the October resistance for democracy broke out in Pusan and Masan to protest the "yusin" fascist dictatorship.
					 The editorial charged that the sponsor of the event sent invitations to the present chief executive and representatives of ruling and opposition parties, but none of them showed at the event except for the representative of the ruling party.

articles.title: Park Geun Hye and Her Cult Deserve Punishment: Spokesman for Council for Human Rights in S. Korea
articles.content:
Park Geun Hye and Her Cult Deserve Punishment: Spokesman for Council for Human Rights in S. Korea
 Pyongyang, October 26 (KCNA) -- Traitor Park Geun Hye of south Korea jailed after being impeached, cursed by the candlelight demonstrators, is talking about "human rights abuses", only to be censured by the public.
					 In this regard, a spokesman for the DPRK Measure Council for Human Rights in South Korea released a statement on Thursday, which said:
					
					 Traitor Park let MH group, a legal advisory company, to submit a "report on human rights abuses" to the UN Human Rights Highest Representative's Office and offered it to CNN as coverage. The report contains such false information told by the traitor that she is hard to sleep with the light turned on overnight in a dirty and cold cell and is suffering from a chronic disease due to the lack of medical care.
					
					 What Park uttered is just a frontal challenge and insult to the candlelight demonstrators who resolutely punished her for her thrice-cursed acts of treachery.
					
					 The UN Office, which received the "report", replied that it is not the subject to be dealt with by it, and that only became a laughing stock of the public.
					
					 However, this clearly shows how desperately the traitor and her cult move to escape punishment.
					
					 If viper-like Park and her cult are allowed to go with impunity, the south Korean people are bound to meet more terrible disasters.
					
					 Only merciless punishment should be meted out to the shameless traitor and her cult, as intended by all Koreans.

articles.title: Action for Payment of Subsidies to Korean Schools Launched in Japan
articles.content:
Action for Payment of Subsidies to Korean Schools Launched in Japan
 Pyongyang, October 26 (KCNA) -- The "society for defending the rights of children of Korean schools", the Ibaragi Prefectural Citizens Council for Peace and other organizations in Ibaragi Prefecture of Japan and the society of mothers of Ibaragi Korean primary, middle and high schools launched a solidarity struggle demanding the resumption of payment of subsidies to the Korean primary, middle and high schools.
					 Representatives of the organizations visited the Prefectural office building to present another interrogation to it with regard to the fact that the authorities had sent a murky answer in reply to their last questionnaire disclosing the impropriety of the order to halt the payment of subsidies.

articles.title: Trump's Reckless Remarks under Fire
articles.content:
Trump's Reckless Remarks under Fire
 Pyongyang, October 26 (KCNA) -- Women Nobel Peace Prize winners of different countries reportedly sent a letter to the secretary general of the United Nations on Oct. 11 as regards the war crisis on the Korean peninsula owing to the U.S. imperialists' moves to stifle the Democratic People's Republic of Korea.
					 The letter said Trump's remarks calling for "total destruction" of the DPRK were explicitly a threat, urging the UN secretary general to directly solve the issue.
					
					 A war should be prevented on the Korean peninsula and the DPRK-U.S. dialogue should be held to defuse the nuclear confrontation, it said.
					
					 World women peace champions active for peace on the Korean peninsula demanded a halt to the U.S.-south Korea joint military drills, lifting of sanctions against the DPRK and calling to task of Trump's reckless remarks, the letter said, adding that the world people should lend their ears to this demand.

articles.title: Kim Jong Un's Work Posted on British Body's Website
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un's Work Posted on British Body's Website
 Pyongyang, October 26 (KCNA) -- Respected Supreme Leader Kim Jong Un's work "National Heritage Conservation Is a Patriotic Undertaking for Adding Brilliance to the History and Traditions of Our Nation" was posted by the British Association for the Study of Songun Policy on its website on Oct. 15.
					 The work, published on Oct. 24, Juche 103 (2014), deals with the facts that President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il made efforts for the national heritage conservation during their revolutionary leadership, prioritizing it, and thus added brilliance to the long history and splendid culture of the Korean nation before the world.
					
					 The work also elucidates the tasks to thoroughly implement the Workers' Party of Korea's policy for the national heritage conservation, champion firmly their undying feats and add brilliance to the history and traditions of the Korean nation.

articles.title: Russian, Serbian Figures Praise Party-building Feats of Peerlessly Great Men of Mt Paektu
articles.content:
Russian, Serbian Figures Praise Party-building Feats of Peerlessly Great Men of Mt Paektu
 Pyongyang, October 26 (KCNA) -- Russian and Serbian political parties held seminars on the feats of leader Kim Jong Il from Oct. 5 to 10 on the occasion of the 20th anniversary of his election as general secretary of the Workers' Party of Korea and its 72nd founding anniversary.
					 Sazhi Umalatova, chairwoman of the Party for Peace and Unity of Russia, said that the WPK is a seasoned and experienced party which ensured the ideological purity of the ranks despite all difficulties and trials and consolidated the single-minded unity of the leader, Party and the masses as firm as a rock.
					
					 No force can prevent the Korean people from stepping up the building of a rich and powerful country under the leadership of the WPK, she added.
					
					 L. A. Kobuizov, first secretary of the Amur Regional Committee of the Communist Party of the Russian Federation, said that the WPK has led the struggle of the Korean people to victory only for more than seven decades in worldwide political storm and stress.
					
					 The WPK could win all victories as it had hold President Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il, the prominent leaders, in high esteem he added.
					
					 Mojgovoy, first secretary of the Central Committee of the Communist Party of the Soviet Union, said that the significant days in Oct. are holidays common to not only the Korean people but also other progressives in the world and that thanks to respected Supreme Leader Kim Jong Un the cause of Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il is being carried forward successfully.
					
					 Marijann Kubik, international secretary of the New Yugoslav Communist Party, praised Kim Jong Il for developing the WPK into the party of the leader and advancing the socialist cause victoriously.

articles.title: DPRK Holidays in October Marked Abroad
articles.content:
DPRK Holidays in October Marked Abroad
 Pyongyang, October 26 (KCNA) -- Foreign media dedicated special write-ups to the 20th anniversary of leader Kim Jong Il's election as general secretary of the Workers' Party of Korea and its 72nd founding anniversary, accompanied with articles titled "Kim Jong Il, undying party-building feats", "WPK's political mode", "Secret of WPK's invincibility", and televised a Korean film.
					 The DR Congo magazine Regard sur l' Environnment no. 9 carried a special write-up, illustrated with the portraits of smiling President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il and photos of respected Supreme Leader Kim Jong Un.
					
					 The magazine dealt with the feats the great leaders performed in the founding and development of the WPK and achievements made in the DPRK under the leadership of Kim Jong Un.
					
					 The October issue of the Belarusian paper Buperyod said that the President put forward the original party-building idea and made thoroughgoing preparations for the party building during the anti-Japanese revolutionary struggle and, on their basis, accomplished the historic cause of the party founding after the liberation of Korea.
					
					 The 6th issue of the Belarusian paper Samostoyatelnosti said that the WPK is demonstrating its might as an invincible party in the international community as it is carrying out the revolution and construction guided by the Juche idea and has achieved the unity and cohesion of the whole party and all the people are wholeheartedly trusting and following their leader.
					
					 The October issue of the British paper Proletarian noted that the WPK has always abided by the principle of independence in the revolution and construction and solved all issues by relying on the people.
					
					 Myanmar TV televised the Korean film "WPK Flag" on Oct. 10 and the Cambodian State Radio on Oct. 8 and 9 introduced the party leadership feats of Kim Jong Il and the political mode of the WPK.

articles.title: Kim Jong Un felicita a Xi Jinping
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un felicita a Xi Jinping
Pyongyang, 26 de octubre (ACNC) -- El Presidente del Partido del Trabajo de Corea, Kim Jong Un, envio el dia 25 un mensaje de felicitacion al Secretario General del Comite Central del Partido Comunista de China, Xi Jinping.
					El texto va como sigue:
					
					Le extiendo sinceras felicitaciones por la celebracion satisfactoria del XIX Congreso del PCCh y por su eleccion como Secretario General del CC del PCCh y Presidente de su Comision Militar Central.
					
					Hoy dia, el pueblo chino entro en la via de construccion del socialismo con peculiaridades chinas de la nueva epoca bajo la guia del Comite Central del PCCh, centrado en el camarada Xi Jinping.
					
					Formulo votos por mayores exitos en sus responsabilidades por cumplir las tareas presentadas en el XIX Congreso del PCCh.
					
					Estoy convencido de que las relaciones entre dos partidos y dos paises se desarrollaran conforme a los intereses de ambos pueblos.

articles.title: Portavoz de CEDD condena la sancion que se extiende hasta al sector de deporte
articles.content:
Portavoz de CEDD condena la sancion que se extiende hasta al sector de deporte
Pyongyang, 26 de octubre (ACNC) -- El portavoz del Comite Estatal de Direccion de Deportes de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea publico el dia 26 una declaracion que sigue:
					 Ahora la febril campana de sancion y presion anti-RPDC, patrocinada por EE.UU., extiende sus garras hasta a la rama deportiva.
					
					 EE.UU. incluyo los equipos deportivos de varios tipos en los rubros de sancion e impide no solo su venta sino tambien el paso por los paises correspondientes de los donados a la RPDC por las organizaciones deportivas internacionales.
					
					  Debido a la sucia y obstinada presion de EE.UU., se retrasan, aunque se acerca el fin del ano, los normales juegos de ida y vuelta programados en Pyongyang segun el acuerdo entre nuestro pais y algunos paises.
					
					  Igualmente, se cancelaron el Campeonato Mundial de Jovenes de Judo de 2017 y el Campeonato Mundial de Jovenes de Levantamiento de Pesas de 2018 a pesar de la decision de las organizaciones deportivas internacionales de auspiciarlos en nuestro pais.
					
					  En particular, Australia desautorizo la entrada en el pais de nuestros jugadores para el partido clasificatorio al Campeonato Sub-19 de la Confederacion Asiatica de Futbol 2018.
					
					  Las actividades deportivas, que promueven la amistad entre los pueblos de varios paises del mundo y el desarrollo de civilizacion, no pueden ser la victima de siniestros objetivos politicos.
					
					  Pero EE.UU. aplica la sancion salvaje en la rama deportiva de la RPDC movilizando a sus satelites.
					
					  Este acto destruye la civilizacion moderna y demuestra su objetivo de suprimir nuestra idea y regimen e impedir totalmente hasta el disfrute de la vida cultural del pueblo coreano.
					
					  Lo comprueba el disparate de la "destruccion total" de nuestro Estado pronunciado por Trump en la reciente Asamblea General de la ONU.
					
					  EE.UU. abusa hasta de las sagradas actividades deportivas para sus fines politicos como derrocar el regimen del Estado soberano.
					
					No obstante, las organizaciones deportivas internacionales deberan mantener el ideal deportivo de promover la paz y desarrollo de la humanidad e impulsar el desarrollo fisico del hombre y la civilizacion moderna.

articles.title: Portavoz de Sociedad Coreana aboga por castigar a Park Geun-hye y sus partidarios
articles.content:
Portavoz de Sociedad Coreana aboga por castigar a Park Geun-hye y sus partidarios
Pyongyang, 26 de octubre (ACNC) -- El vocero de la Sociedad de la RPDC de Medidas de DDHH en el Sur de Corea hizo publica el dia 26 una nota con respecto a que la traidora Park Geun-hye, encarcelada ahora luego de ser dimitida como resultado de la lucha de la poblacion surcoreana con velas encendidas, se hizo objeto de fuertes criticas de diversos sectores por su queja de la "violacion de sus derechos humanos".
					Segun el documento, por conducto del Grupo MH, compania de consulta juridica, Park elaboro el llamado "reporte de violacion de DDHH" y lo remitio a la Oficina del Maximo Representante de DDHH de la ONU.
					
					Ese reporte, transmitido por la cadena norteamericana CNN, recoge embustes tales como "ella se encuentra en una celda sucia y fria con la lampara siempre encendida para quitarle el sueno" y la "falta de tratamiento medico le complica su enfermedad cronica".
					
					Esta chismografia constituye un desafio frontal y burla intolerable a los manifestantes con velas encendidas que sentenciaron rotundamente a esa mujerzuela que se dedicaba a los actos traidores sin precedentes.
					
					Tras recibir el "reporte", la oficina mencionada rehuso examinarlo aduciendo que eso no le compete.
					
					La apelacion a la ONU de Park y sus partidarios remanentes deja conocer que ellos estan desesperados para salir del abismo de muerte.
					
					Si se perdona a ellos, los habitantes surcoreanos sufriran evidentemente tremendos desastres.
					
					Es imperioso castigar implacablemente en nombre de toda la nacion a Park y sus complices que desafiaron frontalmente a la poblacion surcoreana con la cinica farsa de DDHH.

articles.title: Tiene lugar VI Conferencia Nacional de Funcionarios Juridicos
articles.content:
Tiene lugar VI Conferencia Nacional de Funcionarios Juridicos
Pyongyang, 26 de octubre (ACNC) -- Tuvo lugar el dia 25 en el capitalino Palacio Cultural del Pueblo la VI Conferencia Nacional de Funcionarios Juridicos.
					 En el conclave hubo el analisis y balance de los exitos, experiencias y lecciones acumulados en implantar el ambiente revolucionario de cumplimiento de las leyes durante los ultimos 5 anos desde la V conferencia.
					
					Quedaron debatidos igualmente las tareas y remedios para observar mejor las leyes socialistas conforme a la demanda de la revolucion en desarrollo.
					
					 En la ocasion estuvieron presentes Kim Yong Nam, miembro del Presidium del Buro Politico del Comite Central del Partido del Trabajo de Corea y presidente del Presidium de la Asamblea Popular Suprema de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea, el vicepresidente del Presidium de la APS de la RPDC, Yang Hyong Sop, el vicepresidente del CC del PTC, Pak Thae Song, el ministro de Seguridad del Pueblo, Choe Pu Il, los funcionarios interesados, los miembros de los comites de direccion de la observancia de la ley socialista de todos niveles, los funcionarios juridicos y los interpretes ejemplares de las leyes.
					
					  Se dio lectura al mensaje del Maximo Dirigente Kim Jong Un enviado a los participantes en el conclave.
					
					  Hubo informe de Yang Hyong Sop y otras intervenciones.
					
					  Los oradores dijeron que el mensaje del Maximo Dirigente es el ciclo inmortal, que desarrollo y enriquecio la idea y teorias del Presidente Kim Il Sung y el Dirigente Kim Jong Il sobre la observacion de leyes socialistas, y la bandera combativa a ser mantenida firmemente en la lucha por establecer en toda la sociedad el ambiente de respetar la ley.
					
					  Agregaron que la orgullosa historia de desarrollo de esa labor en la RPDC deviene la cronica coronada con las imperecederas hazanas de direccion de los grandes hombres sin pares.
					
					  Prosiguieron que las proezas acumuladas por los lideres coreanos en la observancia de la ley socialista continuan y se desarrollan perfectamente gracias al Maximo Dirigente.
					
					  Enumeraron los exitos alcanzados en la campana para mejorar e intensificar la observancia de la ley socialista.
					
					  Destacaron la necesidad de garantizar en sentido juridico la ofensiva de todo el pueblo para materializar las resoluciones del VII Congreso del PTC al producir grandes cambios en esa materia bajo la direccion del Partido.
